metadata.name: The Alien, The Beat and The Mystery
metadata.description: All started with Carlos choosing a photo to give life to the Alien Lab that we had in mind. The photo had this lab air, we thought it would provide the perfect seed for the AI art creation. With lights and white walls, bringing the luminance and volume necessary. With the initial setup it was time for Vinny to transform it. After the Alien Lab at Area 51 prompt, a quiet and contained photo became this vibrant "all over" lab with a few big headed yellowish aliens that are doing experiments or the other way around, we might never know the answer. But there was something missing. So we called Raffa to the rescue. And he brought the knowledge and the beat, check this out : "The sound that makes up the piece is based on UKGarage, a generic name for a musical category composed of some subgenres that were born from the mixture of classic North American House and English Jungle in the late 1990s and early 2000s when electronic music was reaching new levels of innovation from new technologies
